pilots.name: "Dutch" Vander
pilots.caption: Gold Leader
pilots.ability: After you perform the [Lock] action, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship may acquire a lock on the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.

pilots.name: Gold Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: Commanded by Jon "Dutch" Vander, Gold Squadron played an instrumental role in the Battles of Scarif and Yavin.

pilots.name: Gray Squadron Bomber
pilots.text: Long after the Y-wing was phased out by the Galactic Empire, its durability, dependability, and heavy armament help it remain a staple in the Rebel fleet.

pilots.name: Horton Salm
pilots.caption: Gray Leader
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender.

pilots.name: Norra Wexley
pilots.caption: Gold Nine
pilots.ability: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.
